content: A defining characteristic of these moments is that I get that I don't get it.

tag: html body text table tbody tr td table tbody tr td table tbody tr td p font span
content: Not getting it is not easy. I am a prisoner of my ego and my autosycophantic confidence in my own intuitions. A willing prisoner, for I worship my intuition.

content: But when I travel in a different culture, intuition is a false god. One very hard to dislodge: it has features so familiar I forget it is there.
